title: Raptor
creator_credit: Cynthia Potter, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
brief_description: Cynthia Potter tells of her life in one of Melbourne’s Housing Commission flats and her beloved son Elvis. Energetic, with a passion for insects, Elvis makes the most of life, while Potter does the best she can with what she’s got.
creator_credit_for_label: Cynthia Potter, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
